altername_name: Adventure 13: The Sorceror of Claymorgue Castle
Adventure No. 13: The Sorcerer of Claymorgue Castle
name: The Sorcerer of Claymorgue Castle
overview: Follow the faithful apprentice Beanwick through Claymorgue castle as he searches for the 13 Stars of Power. Can you successfully overcome the castle's magic and retrieve the Stars? "Claymorgue castle harbors spells," warns Solon, the Master Wizard. "But beware - one unskilled in the magical arts cannot predict their outcome."
